name: 99 Naschis: Ice Cream Island Jam
description:
The anual Naschi-Shepherding Tournament is on it's way again! Guide your 99 Naschis from start to finish and become the ultimate Naschi-Shepherder in this very ice cream-cool puzzle game!

Ice Cream-Cool Features

  • 8 Levels on the world famous Ice Cream Island
  • Training Mode
  • Highscore
